laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: At 14 d of age, high serum TSH level persisted at 151 mU/liter; subsequently reduced to 7.0 mU/liter within 1 week after treatment.
TSH levels were 4.2, 3.2, and 3.4 mU/liter at follow-ups at 3, 6, and 12 months, respectively.
Corresponding free T4 concentrations were 1.4, 1.5, and 1.4 ng/dl at follow-ups at 3, 6, and 12 months, respectively, remained unchanged.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Mother: Free T4 1.2 ng/dl, Free T3 3.4 ng/liter, TSH 1.3 mU/liter. Father: Free T4 1.6 ng/dl, Free T3 3.9 ng/liter, TSH 0.9 mU/liter (all within reference ranges).
